ing: 3 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed
2 cups rinsed, drained canned black beans
1 tablespoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
des: "This is a great twist on a traditional guacamole. Serve chilled with tortilla chips or you can even use it as a spread. It is absolutely delicious and one of my favorite snacks."
ins: Stir mashed avocado, chives, cilantro, garlic, and lime juice together in a bowl; stir in black beans, Romano cheese, tomatoes, and cayenne pepper. Refrigerate, covered, until ready to serve.
